attributes.action: Suspention of the Health Reform Bill Pending and Independent Enquiry.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to suspend the Health Reform Bill pending an independent enquiry into the financial links between Conservative party donors and conservative party policy, peers and mps. To establish any wrong doing, breaches of parliamentary code and any conflicts of interests. If any breaches of parliamentary code are discovered for the individuals responsible to be dismissed from parliament with immediate effect.
